mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORD (B_NO, W_WORD, W_FOUND, W_RATIO) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{wordWord}, #{wordFound}, #{wordRatio})
mapper.select:
WITH TOTAL_ROW AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_ROW FROM BOARD ),
BASE_WORD AS ( SELECT * FROM WORD WHERE W_WORD IN (SELECT W_WORD FROM WORD WHERE B_NO = #{boardNum}) ),
GROUPED_WORD AS ( SELECT B_NO, W_WORD, W_FOUND, W_RATIO FROM BASE_WORD GROUP BY B_NO, W_WORD, W_FOUND, W_RATIO ),
FILTERED_WORD AS ( SELECT * FROM GROUPED_WORD WHERE B_NO IN ( SELECT B_NO FROM GROUPED_WORD GROUP BY B_NO HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT W_WORD) <= 0.4 * (SELECT TOTAL_ROW FROM TOTAL_ROW) ) ),
FINAL_WORD AS ( SELECT B_NO, SUM(W_FOUND) AS TOTAL_FOUND, AVG(W_RATIO) AS AVG_RATIO FROM FILTERED_WORD GROUP BY B_NO HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ),
SUMMED_DATA AS ( SELECT B_NO, TOTAL_FOUND, AVG_RATIO FROM FINAL_WORD GROUP BY B_NO ),
LAST_DATA as ( SELECT B_NO, TOTAL_FOUND, AVG_RATIO FROM SUMMED_DATA WHERE B_NO <> #{boardNum} ) SELECT B.* FROM BOARD B JOIN LAST_DATA L ON B.B_NO = L.B_NO ORDER BY L.TOTAL_FOUND DESC, L.AVG_RATIO DESC;
